mapper.update: UPDATE personallog.article SET is_top=#{isTop}, update_time=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.name as category_name, u.username, u.avatar FROM personallog.article a LEFT JOIN personallog.category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN personallog.user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
